title: Designing Personalized Language Learning Pathways Based on Co-Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or Advanced Language Proficiency and Basic Understanding of Curriculum Design
context.additional_context: Enhancing the capacity of current secondary education practitioners to flexibly design language education programs

learning_goals: Learners can design at least three flexible learning paths tailored to their educational context
Develop learner-participatory language education modules using the co-design process
Measure the effectiveness of personalized learning paths using digital tools and propose improvement strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
